title.narrative: Angola - Projet de formation des cadres moyens

description.narrative: The governments of RSA, Swaziland and Mozambique will have to submit requests for the Bank's financing of the study. The Bank could consider funding part of the share of Mozambique from ADF/TAF source. The Bank shoud look funds from NTF and/or bilateral sources to finance the shares of RSA and Swaziland.
